column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////You don't have to always get crazy with things. Stay tried and true and do it well. There's lots of value in that. At Bavette's
column2: of course there's frites as a side. Of course there's asparagus served with butter. Fluffy bread to gather up all the meat juice? Oysters for appetizers? Yea of course
column3: it all makes sense. This is an approachable traditional steakhouse
column4: and that's exactly where they want to be.
